trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Representerer basisklasse for alle <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event to respond when the user clicks a ButtonBase.
trans-unit.target: Behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>hendelsen svarer når brukeren klikker en ButtonBase.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The user can raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event by using an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan øke det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>hendelse ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>eller ved å trykke ENTER eller mellomrom når kontrollen har fokus.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> to `true` and captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Når du trykker mellomrom, kontroll-angir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>til `true` og registrerer musen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen vil resultatet heve musen hendelser, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>og <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> or capture the mouse, but it does raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>eller angi endres ikke <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>eller capture musen, men den hever den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonBase sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A> attached property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: ButtonBase angir den <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>knyttet til å `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonBase sets the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: ButtonBase angir den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A ButtonBase is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: En ButtonBase er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, noe som betyr at det kan inneholde ett enkelt objekt av en annen type (for eksempel en streng, et bilde eller en panelet).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The user can raise the Click event by using an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan øke Click-hendelsen ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>eller ved å trykke ENTER eller mellomrom når kontrollen har fokus.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> to `true` and captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Når du trykker mellomrom, kontroll-angir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>til `true` og registrerer musen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen vil resultatet heve musen hendelser, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>og <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> or capture the mouse, but it does raise the Click event.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>eller angi endres ikke <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>eller capture musen, men den heve Click-hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase> marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method and raises the Click event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>for den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>hendelse som behandles i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>metoden og opphøyer Click-hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>

trans-unit.source: Hence, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> event will never occur for a control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>vil aldri inntreffer for en kontroll som arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Koble i stedet en hendelsesbehandling til den <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>hendelsen eller kall <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>med `handledEventsToo` satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: ## Rutet hendelsesinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Rutingstrategi | Bobling | | Representanten | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This event corresponds to a left mouse button click.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen svarer til venstre for museklikk.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir når den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> inntreffer.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: When the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> inntreffer.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kommandoen for å aktivere når denne knappen trykkes.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to associate a command with a particular button instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes til å knytte en kommando for en bestemt knapp-forekomst.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], this property is most often set to be a static command value from one of the existing command libraries, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands>.
trans-unit.target: I [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], egenskapen oftest er angitt som en statisk kommandoen-verdi fra en eksisterende kommandoen-bibliotekene, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands>eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands>

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se [tiltrekker seg oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *commandName* The command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *kommandonavn* kommandoen for å aktivere når denne knappen trykkes.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: En kommando for å aktivere når denne knappen trykkes.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir parameteren skal sendes til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Most existing commands from the command libraries do not use a command parameter.
trans-unit.target: De fleste eksisterende kommandoer i kommandoen Libraries bruker ikke en kommandoparameter.

trans-unit.source: Of the commands that do use a command parameter, most of these take a parameter with some primitive type value, such as an integer or a string.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoer som bruker en kommandoparameter, ta de fleste av disse en parameter med en primitiv type-verdi, for eksempel et heltall eller en streng.

trans-unit.source: However, it is possible to create a custom command where that command expects a nonprimitive type as its command parameter.
trans-unit.target: Det er imidlertid mulig å opprette en egendefinert kommando der kommandoen forventer en ikke-primitiv type som kommandoparameter.

trans-unit.source: For a custom command case like this, setting CommandParameter in code might require a new or existing object instance.
trans-unit.target: For egendefinert kommando fall ut kan innstillingen CommandParameter i kode føre til en ny eller eksisterende objektforekomst.

trans-unit.source: Setting CommandParameter in markup might require property element syntax, where the object element filling the property element syntax is a new element of the type expected by that command.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingen CommandParameter i markup kreve egenskapen element syntaks, der elementet objektet fyller syntaksen for egenskapen element er et nytt objekt av typen som var forventet av kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, setting in markup might require a reference through a markup extension to an existing object (typically these references are made with [Binding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: Innstillingen i markup kan eventuelt krever en referanse gjennom filtypen markup til eksisterende objekter (vanligvis disse referansene utføres med [Binding Markup utvidelsen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) eller [StaticResource Markup filtypen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *commandParameter* A value of the same type as the particular command specified in the property expects.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *commandParameter* en verdi av samme type som den bestemte kommandoen i den egenskapen forventer.

trans-unit.source: If you use an existing command library command, see that command library's documentation for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, including which type of CommandParameter the command expects.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker en eksisterende kommandoen biblioteket kommando, dokumentasjonen denne kommandoen bibliotek for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] bruksinformasjon, inkludert hvilken type CommandParameter kommandoen forventer.

trans-unit.source: If you use a custom command, see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker en egendefinert kommando, kan du se kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: Parameter to pass to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: Parameteren skal sendes til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the routed <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den distribuerte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element on which to raise the specified command.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir element for å øke den angitte kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The CommandTarget property cannot be used to define a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CommandTarget kan ikke brukes til å definere en <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The CommandTarget property provides a reference to an element that is already defined somewhere in your application.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CommandTarget inneholder en referanse til et element som allerede er definert et eller annet sted i programmets.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *elementName* The name of that receives the command.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *elementName* navnet på som mottar kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: Element on which to raise a command.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som opphøye en kommando.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: If you choose to override this implementation, make certain that you call the base method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger å overstyre denne implementeringen, kontroller at du kaller base-metoden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> is currently activated.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"> </xref> for øyeblikket er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: IsPressed is the state of a button that indicates the left mouse button or SPACEBAR is pressed over the button.
trans-unit.target: IsPressed er tilstanden til en knapp som angir den venstre museknappen eller mellomrom trykkes over knappen.

trans-unit.source: When IsPressed is `true`, the control captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Når IsPressed er `true`, kontrollen fanger musen.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen vil resultatet heve musen hendelser, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>og <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change IsPressed or capture the mouse, but is does raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>eller angi ikke endre IsPressed eller capture musen, men finnes Hev den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsPressed has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: Starter med .NET Framework, versjon 3.0 har Service Pack 1, IsPressed en beskyttet setter.

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke denne funksjonen, må programmet mål .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og oppdatering av avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> is activated; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"> </xref> er aktivert, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for this control is called.
trans-unit.target: Svarer når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>for denne kontrollen, kalles.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A> is `true`, this method calls the base implementation, which gives this control focus.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A>er `true`, metodekall base implementeringen, som gir denne kontrollfokus.</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed> event.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen viser <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>hendelsen ved å kalle <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [rutet hendelser oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>

trans-unit.source: The data for <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dataene for <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Gir klassen behandling den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> rutet hendelsen som oppstår når brukeren trykker en tast mens kontrollen er i fokus.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> and one of the following cases are true: - The user presses the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen merker det <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>hendelse som behandles ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>for Hendelsesdata til `true` når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>ikke er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>og ett av følgende tilfeller er oppfylt:-brukeren trykker mellomrom.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: - The user presses ENTER and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A> is `true` for this control.
trans-unit.target: -Trykke ENTER og <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>er `true` for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event data.
trans-unit.target: I alle andre tilfeller denne implementeringen, endres ikke tilstanden håndtert (den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>egenskapen) for den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user releases a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Gir klassen behandling den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> rutet hendelsen som oppstår når brukeren slipper en nøkkel når kontrollen er i fokus.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when the user releases the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen merker det <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>hendelse som behandles ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>for Hendelsesdata til `true` når brukeren slipper mellomrom.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, denne implementeringen endrer ikke tilstanden håndtert (den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>egenskapen) for den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata for den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Called when an element loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når et element mister tastaturfokus.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata for den <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement.LostKeyboardFocus"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref> routed event that occurs when this control is no longer receiving mouse event messages.
trans-unit.target: Gir klassen behandling den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"> </xref> rutet hendelsen som oppstår når kontrollen er ikke lenger motta hendelsesmeldinger musen.

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> event data.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen endrer ikke tilstanden håndtert (den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>egenskapen) for den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture>Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture> event.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*> routed event that occurs when the mouse enters this control.
trans-unit.target: Gir klassen behandling den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>rutet hendelsen som oppstår når musen flyttes til denne kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, this implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, merker for denne implementeringen av <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>hendelse som behandles ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>for Hendelsesdata til `true` og oppretter den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter> event.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse leaves an element.
trans-unit.target: Gir klassen behandling den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"> </xref> rutet hendelsen som oppstår når musen forlater et element.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen merker det <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>hendelse som behandles ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>for Hendelsesdata til `true` når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: Gir klassen behandling den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref> rutet hendelsen som oppstår når venstre museknappen trykkes mens musepekeren holdes over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen merker det <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>hendelse som behandles ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>for Hendelsesdata til `true` når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>er ikke satt til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Å svare på det <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>hendelsen knytte en hendelsesbehandling til den <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>hendelsen eller kall <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>med `handledEventsToo` satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: Gir klassen behandling den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"> </xref> rutet hendelsen som oppstår når den venstre museknappen når musepekeren holdes over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen merker det <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>hendelse som behandles ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>for Hendelsesdata til `true` når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>er ikke satt til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Å svare på det <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>hendelsen knytte en hendelsesbehandling til den <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp>hendelsen eller kall <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>med `handledEventsToo` satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> is `true`, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>er <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>er `true`, denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse pointer moves while over this element.
trans-unit.target: Gir klassen behandling den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref> rutet hendelsen som oppstår når musepekeren flyttes over dette elementet.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen merker det <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>hendelsen som behandles ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>for Hendelsesdata til `true` når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>ikke er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>er `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Å svare på det <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>hendelsen knytte en hendelsesbehandling til den <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove>hendelsen eller kall <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>med `handledEventsToo` satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Called when the rendered size of a control changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når gjengitte størrelsen på en kontroll endres.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the OnRenderSizeChanged method of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer metoden OnRenderSizeChanged for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size changes.
trans-unit.target: Angir endres størrelse.
